name: HLAKit
body:
### Variable Declarations

Syntax:
```
[shared] TYPE LABEL [ARRAY_SIZE] [:ADDRESS] [= VALUE]
```

Named variables make coding in assembly much easier.  HLAKit variables are very flexible and do a lot of the hard work for you.

Examples:
```
byte counter
byte initialized_counter = 123
struct coords { byte x, y } myCoords
struct coords theirCoords = { 5, 6 }
byte initialized_array[] = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }
```
